column1: 1594246821756411909,1594246821756411909@alat_ng Hello Alatbywema,  For over a week you guys have refused to upgrade my account to Tier 3. I had written several emails, sent in several paperwork and did everything I was told to do.  What kind of bank ignores it's customers plight or request?  I regret banking with Wema Bank. t_end
